hanzi-su-wiki:
皆

Значения

Все, всё

Мнемоника

  • Искажено. Выбирать ораторов из общей массы путём сравнения 比 лучших из них. Элемент «рот с языком» сейчас пишется как «белый» 白.

  • "Сравните 比 людей на белом 白 здании. Все выглядят очень похоже."
purpleculture_pinyin:
jiē
all; each and every; in all cases
все; каждый; во всех случаях
rtega_mnemonic:

X		all, everyone
  • all members with small cups 匕匕 present at a meal 白; modf. 𤽏 of 𠊊: 食
 庶 各 全 諸; 毎; 階

皆皆RSall, every, everybody
  • persons 匕匕 eating a meal 白 comparing 比 and discussing all that is under the sun
purpleculture_examples:
比比皆是 [ bǐ bǐ jiē shì ]: can be found everywhere
皆大欢喜 [ jiē dà huān xǐ ]: As You Like It, comedy by Shakespeare
皆大欢喜 [ jiē dà huān xǐ ]: to everyone's delight and satisfaction
啼笑皆非 [ tí xiào jiē fēi ]: lit. not to know whether to laugh or cry (idiom); between laughter and tears
有口皆碑 [ yǒu kǒu jiē bēi ]: every voice gives praise (idiom); with an extensive public reputation
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 比 [ bǐ ] to compare, liken; comparison; than
    • 白 [ bái ] white; clear, pure, unblemished; bright
heisig_chinese_memo: If you compare colors, you will find that white is produced from the mix of all the others.
heisig_constituent: all, compare, spoon, sitting on the ground, white, dove, spoon2, sitting on the ground2
heisig_story: Think of the housewives in TV commercials "comparing the whiteness" of their laundry across the fence, a typical advertisement for the popular detergent known as All. (If you don't know the brand, surely you've heard the phrases "all-purpose detergent" or "all-temperature detergent.")
koohiiStory1: If you compare colors, you will find that white is produced from the mix of all the others.
koohiiStory2: Sometimes, Dr. Heisig´s keyword choices are really quite bizarre. This doesn´t mean all, it means everyone!! Picture two ku klux klansmen comparing whose skin is whiter...finally, they agree that everyone there is white.
jp_example_words:
皆(みな): all, everything
皆さん(みなさん): everyone
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you compare white light to the other colors you'll realize... white consists of all the colors in one. It contains all the colors in the spectrum in one color. It is the one color that is everything.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Just look at the color white. Compare it to other colors. Now look at white again. Split it up into all the colors, creating a beautiful spectrum. Wow, it's all the colors!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You decide white light is the ultimate color. You decide you want to put it on all things to make everything white. "What a great idea," you think. You try to put it on everything and you nearly succeed... except, the miners (みな). They keep getting dirty doing all their mining things. NOOO, your plan is ruined!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine everything covered in white. Everything in the world. Then, you see a dark splotch. It's the miners, they're all covered in coal, ruining all your ambitions. Walk up to them and see all the dirt on the perfectly white uniforms you gave them just a few minutes earlier. Feel enraged at them. How could they ruin all this white you made for all the people of the world!?
Ru_Notes: Фонетик для ряда кандзи: 階 (きざはし、カイ этаж), 諧 (かな．う、やわ．らぐ、カイ благозвучие, созвучие), 楷 (カイ образец, уставной стиль).
Kanshudo_mnemonic: compare (比) to white (白) - that's what everyone does
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: If you compare colors, you will find that white is produced from the mix of all the others.
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle from the " mouth " from one or two " tigers " and " a few ", " several " is the phonetic (Chen Jian), topography original meaning is unknown, one that from the " Tiger " from " E ", " E " Like the shape of residual bone, it means that two tigers will compete for residual bone (Chen Bingxin).

There are two Bronze shape, from the first shape " from the" " Gan " tied by the suspect and there are two extended, are intended. Later " from " falsely becomes " ratio " as " all " of sound character. " Gan " is made by adding a point in the middle of the " mouth " shape. Bronze writing is used as a person's name. The second type of font is from " tiger " from " ji " to "甘", which is similar to the oracle bone inscriptions. The inscriptions in inscriptions mean Ju and Du, which are all-inclusive words. Zhongshan Wangding: "Any thoughts are followed." Zhongshan Wang Fanghu: "All the lords are congratulated.

"Shuowen": "Everything, all words. Congbi Congbai."
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle from the " mouth " from one or two " tigers " and " a few ", " several " is the phonetic (Chen Jian), topography original meaning is unknown, one that from the " Tiger " from " E ", " E " Like the remnant bone, it means that two tigers will compete for the remnant bone (Chen Bingxin).
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從「口」從一或二「虎」及「几」，「几」是聲符(陳劍)，構形初義不明，一說從「虎」從「歺」，「歺」象殘骨之形，會二虎爭殘骨之意(陳秉新)。

　　金文有兩種字形，第一種字形從「从」從「甘」，疑由二人並列引申有並、皆之意。後來「从」訛變為「比」，作為「皆」的聲符。「甘」是在「口」形中間加一點而成。金文用作人名。第二種字形從「虎」從「几」從「甘」，與甲骨文形近。金文表示俱、都，是統括之詞，中山王鼎：「謀慮皆從」，中山王方壺：「者(諸)侯皆賀」。

　　《說文》：「皆，俱詞也。从比从白。」
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從「口」從一或二「虎」及「几」，「几」是聲符(陳劍)，構形初義不明，一說從「虎」從「歺」，「歺」象殘骨之形，會二虎爭殘骨之意(陳秉新)。

皆字的基本解释

皆
jiē
全，都：皆大欢喜。人人皆知。放之四海而皆准。
都全

皆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiē］
［《廣韻》古諧切，平皆，見。］
(1)都，全。
(2)普遍。
(3)偕；一同。
(4)比拟。

皆字的英文翻译

◎ 皆
all

皆字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【白字部】　皆； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页786第12
【唐韻】古諧切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】居諧切，?音街。【說文】俱詞也。【小爾雅】同也。【易·解卦】雷雨作，而百果草木皆甲坼。鄭康成讀皆如懈，非。　又【字彙補】居之切，音箕。【前漢·孟喜傳】箕子者，萬物方荄茲也。【師古註】荄，音皆。古皆荄與箕音同。　又叶舉里切，音几。【詩·周頌】以治百禮，降福孔皆。【傳】皆，遍也。與偕通。【荀勗東西廂歌】降福孔偕。　【說文】白字兩見，一在自部，自部之白，疾二切，卽自字。皆字載自部中，則應从白。【集韻】或作皆，非。

皆字的源字形

皆字的起名意思

：1、意为全部、都的意思，比如皆大欢喜；2、会意，“并”的意思。比如众所皆知。3、通“全”的意思，比如十全十美、海纳百川、皆大欢喜

Source glyph
all
Name meaning
: 1. It means all and all, for example, everyone is happy; 2. Knowing, meaning "union". Such as everyone knows. 3. It means "full", such as perfection, inclusiveness, and happiness

все

Слово изначально состоит из двух людей (представляющих множество людей) и «ри» (представляющих говорение).
Все так говорят, изначальное значение - «ду».
«Аналекты Конфуция»: «В четырех морях все братья тоже братья», и это имеет значение «то же самое», которое позже было написано как «кай».
«Хан Фэйзи»: Все работает.
"
Курсив
5 книг
Упрощенные символы
Но сказал
jiē
I наречие
1) обобщающее слово, указывающее, что действие или свойство, обозначаемое сказуемым, в равной мере распространяется на все предметы, обозначенные подлежащим или подлежащими; все; весь, всё; везде; всегда, каждый раз; в равной степени
天下之民皆引领而望之矣 весь народ Поднебесной, вытянув шеи, смотрит (будет смотреть) на него с надеждой
各地皆然 так дело обстоит везде (в каждой местности)
天下之恶皆归焉 все грехи Поднебесной были приписаны ему
2) вместе, совместно
予及汝皆亡 погибли вместе с тобой
3) в местоименном употреблении: все; каждый
皆大欢喜 все сильно обрадовались
II прил.
* повсеместный
降福孔皆 ниспослать счастье повсеместно (всем без изъятия)
III собств.
Цзе (фамилия)

皆

Значения

Все, всё

Мнемоника

  • Искажено. Выбирать ораторов из общей массы путём сравнения 比 лучших из них. Элемент «рот с языком» сейчас пишется как «белый» 白.

  • "Сравните 比 людей на белом 白 здании. Все выглядят очень похоже."
Radicals: 比, 白  (compare, white)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you compare white light to the other colors you'll realize... white consists of all the colors in one. It contains all the colors in the spectrum in one color. It is the one color that is everything.
Just look at the color white. Compare it to other colors. Now look at white again. Split it up into all the colors, creating a beautiful spectrum. Wow, it's all the colors!
Reading Mnemonic
You decide white light is the ultimate color. You decide you want to put it on all things to make everything white. "What a great idea," you think. You try to put it on everything and you nearly succeed... except, the miners (みな). They keep getting dirty doing all their mining things. NOOO, your plan is ruined!
Imagine everything covered in white. Everything in the world. Then, you see a dark splotch. It's the miners, they're all covered in coal, ruining all your ambitions. Walk up to them and see all the dirt on the perfectly white uniforms you gave them just a few minutes earlier. Feel enraged at them. How could they ruin all this white you made for all the people of the world!?

Examples: 皆 (みな)
比 (сравнивать), 白 (белый)
Фонетик для ряда кандзи: 階 (きざはし、カイ этаж), 諧 (かな．う、やわ．らぐ、カイ благозвучие, созвучие), 楷 (カイ образец, уставной стиль).
